players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Let's not jump to conclusions, we don't know who the killer is yet. We should keep an open mind and discuss all possibilities."
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Let's not rush to accuse anyone until we have more information."
Diana: "Bob, you're lying. I investigated you last night and found out that you're the mafioso. We should call the police immediately."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
